relation: Categories
Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The campus is very secure, they are willing to help. They are there to help you out if you are in need. In just one phone call they can be there to protect you.

Greek life helps you network yourself for when you need a job after college. Greeks helps out in the community and they are willing to give back. It will give you reason to perform well in the class room.
Various clubs and activities can help build your character. It can also help you get involved in the school. Also it can get you apart of some friends that like the same things you do.
Students of different backgrounds can make friends here. The diversity at school is increasing every year. You can become very active at school by joining the Smith family.
The student union is a great place to meet people. You can play pool, watch tv, and even play ping pong. The union is one location where you can hang out with your friends.
School is very expensive so make sure you go out and try everything. Your college life is the best time of your life so enjoy it. While you are in college you will meet some life long friends.

Make sure that you get out and explore the campus. Try to go and join various clubs and organizations on campus to see what common interests you have with other people. Enjoy the weekends because that is a great time to unwind with your friends.
Try to make the most out of the cafe food. Make sure you get all of the food groups in every meal. The cafe will be able to supply you with a good meal everyday you walk in there.

Getting to know and understand the people that live in your dorm can help you make new friends. The more friends you have in your dorm the better your college experience will be. The people in the dorm can help you out with things you may need throughout the school year.
Always read the required material carefully. Never be afraid to go above and beyond the call of duty on your work. Pay attention to deadlines of your work so you can get all of it done on time.
Never forget the reason you came to college. Make sure that you use your time wisely and focus on your studies. Always have pride for your school and stay active on campus.
Johnson C. Smith University is a wonderful school and it is becoming more diverse. The teachers are there to help you anytime you need it. There is no better place to be than Johnson C. Smith.
pageTitle: Johnson C Smith University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

During the Golden Bull Academy which is a Program for incoming freshman I learned so much. Most importantly the school made me feel at home. JCSU is a family and as a freshman I have become a part of that family. I cant wait to start school on Aug 12,2010. I'm really looking forward to it. ;D}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Brittne from Copley, OH 05/16/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 43 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you wanna have fun and get a great education this is the best institution for you! Tips for prospective students Get to know your professors and administration. It will make coming to Smith easier. Bang for the buck For what we pay to attend JCSU I expect more, but we are growing and building to make JCSU the best HBCU in the south. Am enjoying being here I have met some really terrific people who I wouldn't trade in for the world!!!!!!! Am learning a lot I am learning so much at Johnson C. Smith University. Everyday
